description: Now I understand why the brand has thousands of 5-star reviews.

html:
Best Retinal

Medik8 Crystal Retinal

Vitamin A is a tricky ingredient to navigate. Too strong of a formula can wreak havoc on skin not primed for its formula, and too low a percentage makes for slow, barely noticeable results. Crystal Retinal expertly demonstrates the difference between retinal and retinol—the former is the more potent, fast-working version of vitamin A, while the latter is slower and more tolerable for most skin types. Because of this, Medik8’s Crystal Retinal line supplies the powerhouse ingredient in various strengths depending on skill level: 1, 3, 6, 10, 20, 24. Regardless of which one you choose, the formula is designed to reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and firm and brighten the skin. Of course, a retinal-heavy routine needs cushion, so this formula packs hyaluronic acid, glycerin, and vitamin E to calm the skin.

Best for: All skin types

Key ingredients: Retinaldehyde

Size: 1 fl oz

Medik8 rating: 4.8/5 stars

An ELLE editor says: “My introduction to Medik8 was through its Crystal Retinal line. Confident in my already retinol-primed skin, I started at CR6 a few times a week and noticed the peeling effects almost immediately. So I decreased the intensity to the CR3 and found this to be my sweet spot. I still see my renewed skin peeking through the flakes, and my face looks more radiant and smoother.”—Nerisha Penrose, ELLE.com beauty commerce editor

Best Toner for Radiance

Medik8 Press & Glow®

Dullness and breakouts are no match for the enzyme-packed toner. While Medik8’s Press & Clear is an ELLE editor favorite, Press & Glow addresses loss of radiance and texture, resulting in clarified, brighter, and softer skin.

Best for: All skin types

Key ingredients: Acai extract, prickly pear extract, aloe, gluconolactone

Size: 6.7 fl oz

Medik8 rating: 4.9/5 stars

An ELLE editor says: “My morning skin routine isn’t complete without this gem. As someone with acne-prone skin, half my battle is trying to erase or fade dark spots and brighten my hyperpigmentation. The more I use this, the brighter my skin appears, and the smoother it feels. This in the AM and my CR3 in the PM has my skin looking amazing.”—Nerisha Penrose

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Peptide Serum

Medik8 Liquid Peptides™

Peptides are all the rage in skin care right now because of their anti-aging benefits. This composition delivers a supercharged burst of peptides’ firming and plumping goodness—the main star being Matrixyl® 3000, a combination of peptides—to stave off fine lines, wrinkles, and loss of elasticity for as long as possible.

Best for: All skin types

Key ingredients: Matrixyl® 3000, hyaluronic acid

Size: 1 fl oz

Medik8 rating: 4.9/5 stars

An ELLE editor says: “I’m at the age where I’m investing in products to make me age healthily, instead of ones touted to keep me young forever. You see, I’m not averse to aging, but as someone battling insomnia, I understand it’s only a matter of time before my late-night scrolling catches up to me. Using this peptide serum is the antidote to my aging woes; powered by various types of peptides and hyaluronic acid, Liquid Peptides is basically my fountain of youth in a tiny bottle.”—Nerisha Penrose

Best Resurfacing Cleanser

Medik8 Surface Radiance Cleanse

Boosting radiance isn’t a job reserved for serums. The Surface Radiance Cleanse starts the job from step one, using a blend of AHAs and BHAs to gently resurface rough texture and uneven tone.

Best for: All skin types

Key ingredients: Mandelic acid, lactic acid, salicylic acid

Size: 5 fl oz

Medik8 rating: 4.8/5 stars

A Medik8 reviewer says: “This is the best face cleanser I have ever used. It leaves my skin feeling clean and clear without drying it out. You only need a small amount so the value for your money is really good. I recommend it to everyone!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Vitamin C Serum

Medik8 Super C Ferulic

Vitamin C works great alone, but even better with its handy sidekick, ferulic acid. The Super C Ferulic serum imparts its antioxidant benefits to brighten, firm, and even the skin.

Best for: All skin types

Key ingredients: L-Ascorbic Acid (vitamin C), ferulic acid, vitamin E, turmeric root extract

Size: 1 fl oz

Medik8 rating: 4.7/5 stars

An ELLE editor says: “Of all the vitamin C serums I’ve tried, I enjoy this one most because it’s non-sticky and lightweight. This formula keeps my skin bright and smooth. Read all about my experience here.”—Nerisha Penrose

Best Daily Moisturizer

Medik8 Total Moisture Daily Facial Cream

After splashing your skin with Liquid Peptides, add an extra layer of nourishment with this face cream. Designed for use at any time during the day, the creamy texture is comprised of hyaluronic acid, peptides, and ceramides to deliver moisture and restore plumpness and bounciness.

Best for: All skin types

Key ingredients: Hyaluronic acid, peptides, ceramides, and lipids

Size: 1.6 fl oz

Medik8 rating: 4.9/5 stars

A Medik8 reviewer says: “You don’t often believe the advertising when you look at photos of models’s moisturized faces. But this is exactly the case when after the first week you are in the same place of this model with a moisturized face and skin that seems to breathe with its whole chest again!”

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

Best Retinal Eye Cream

Medik8 Crystal Retinal® Ceramide Eye

The eyes are the most delicate part of our face, which means it needs a touch more care and attention as we ago. An extension of the Crystal Retinal line, this eye cream uses a similar formula to reduce the look of wrinkles and fine lines under the eye while calming the area.

Best for: All skin types

Key ingredients: Retinaldehyde, ceramides, hyaluronic acid, chamomile extract

Size: 0.5 fl oz

Medik8 rating: 4.8/5 stars

A Medik8 reviewer says: “I noticed a visible reduction in dark circles within a couple of weeks of using the product. The area around my eyes looks more radiant and even-toned.”

Best Oil Cleanser

Medik8 Lipid-Balance Cleansing Oil

If you want to be confident that every trace of your makeup has dissolved, add this cleansing oil to your routine. As the safflower oil helps break down all dirt and makeup lodged in your pores, moringa extract and omega-6 provide nourishment to strengthen the skin throughout the process.

Best for: All skin types

Key ingredients: Safflower oil, moringa extract, oemga-6

Size: 4.7 fl oz

Medik8 rating: 4.9/5 stars

A Medik8 reviewer says: “Takes everything off without a trace. It takes off a full face of make up, SPF and mascara, and really helps to keep skin clear, too.”
